question: You travelled by plane last week and your suitcase was lost. You have still heard nothing from the airline Company, write to the airline and explain what happened. Describe your bag and tell them what was in it and what they were going to do about it?
text: I am writing in order to get information about my luggage, which was lost in your flight named Indian Airline whereas my ticket number was 2134A8O. Although I have submitted my complaint in the reception area in reference to my baggage, yet no message has been received by me till now.

Besides, my bag was made of leather material which looked like a box with two locks in front, whereas handle on top as well as a strap attached to both sides and the colour of the bag was black with brown outlining.
Furthermore, there were documents, a notebook, car keys and $1300 cash inside the suitcase. Consequently, last week I was unable to use my car because the keys were in my briefcase.
Let me know what steps you are going to take as soon as possible.I am looking forward to hearing from you.
